"The Campship": "This is the Campship. This is where you can prepare yourself before starting a quest."

"Each quest has an objective. That may be eliminating enemies that appear, obtaining Quest Points or other things. The objectives vary between quests.

Achieve the objective, and you can get the corresponding reward."
"Also, there are some simple shops on board, though the goods they carry are limited compared to the ARKS Lobby. You can also put items into your Storage."
